artifacts.summary: Audit found files cannot be archived (actively used); documented 15 sorries as acceptable technical debt
Updated plan with dependency analysis findings and adapted approach

completion_data.completion_summary: Audited CoherentConstruction.lean (10 sorries) and TaskRelation.lean (5 sorries). Dependency analysis revealed files cannot be archived as they are actively used by the completeness proof. Documented all 15 sorries as acceptable technical debt not on the critical proof path.
